entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
